Continue the loop with a line: - Start Point: [0.087, 0.0] - End Point: [0.5625, 0.0] 3. Continue the loop with an arc: - Start Point: [0.5625, 0.0] - Mid Point: [0.624, 0.0255] - End Point: [0.6495, 0.087] 4. Start with a line: - Start Point: [0.116, 0.142] - End Point: [0.5335, 0.142] 2. Continue the loop with a line: - Start Point: [0.5335, 0.142] - End Point: [0.5335, 0.3219] 3.
